job_title: Assistant Professor, Learning Support in Barnesville, GA
pros: Very supportive administration, good benefits with lots of plans to choose from, and a lot of creative freedom
cons: Not much room for moving up.  Also, the city of Barnesville is small and not really that close to any major cities.  Atlanta is about an hour away, but other than that it is very much small town living.  Prices of real estate are also high considering the location.

pros: Excellent teachers and supervisor of the Student Success Center was much liked and respected.
cons: Technical support irritated many of the students and workers. Tutees sometimes had attitude problems.
